0.description: Consolidated work hub featuring two tables, a bookshelf, multiple seating options, dual screens (TV and monitor), a computer tower, keyboard, mouse, and assorted reading materials, illuminated by nearby window light and accented with a wall picture.

1.description: Cluster of waste and storage items including several bags, trash bins, a box, and a pair of sandals.

2.description: Sleeping nook with a bed beneath a window, accompanied by a bookshelf, reading lamp, small stool, and a personal bag.
